title: Exchange It Online
author: Exchange It Online
content: Dear forum users, welcome to Exchange It Online e-currency exchanger!On 15 December 2018, Exchange It Online started as an exchange service dedicated to those who wish to exchange cryptocurrency in a luxurious way! Since then we have been operating our exchange service where we deliver you the most awesome exchange experience you ever had! Our major point is to provide our clients the safest and quickest method to make transactions. We offer popular crypto-crypto exchange directions with the best exchange rate.Our main advantages are:Popular crypto to crypto exchange direction.Favorable exchange rates.Confidentiality of user data.Affiliate program.Individual conditions for large exchange volumes.Website: https://www.exchangeit.onlineOur e-mail support channel: help@exchangeit.onlineCustomer support is provided only through online chat and e-mail. If someone writes to you on our behalf from other sources, they are scammers.Exchanges are carried out exclusively on the site through the application form!

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Just wondering, you have got Bestchange displayed as one of your partners, but there is no official mention by them about you being their partner, or you don't even appear on their exchanger monitor.What are we missing?

comments.author: Exchange It Online
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 30, 2022, 11:58:55 PMJust wondering, you have got Bestchange displayed as one of your partners, but there is no official mention by them about you being their partner, or you don't even appear on their exchanger monitor.What are we missing?You are correct. We have been operating for a long time but did not officially apply to Bestchange listing. Recently our website is undergoing maintenance as we are adding a lot more exchange directions then we will be officially applying to Bestchange. As for your question, although we are not officially a partner yet, it is required to display Bestchange monitoring's clickable button or logo to apply for listing. You can find this information by visiting this page https://www.bestchange.com/wiki/add.html and check Technical requirement no 11 which states "The monitoring's clickable button or logo must be placed on the website's main page in a visible place. In case there are multiple logos on your website, the BestChange's logo must be placed first." We are just fulfilling the conditions for application.I hope this clarifies your confusion. We aim to be among the listed exchangers very soon after we officially apply to reputed monitor like BestChange.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Exchange It Online on July 03, 2022, 02:12:33 PMAs for your question, although we are not officially a partner yet, it is required to display Bestchange monitoring's clickable button or logo to apply for listing. You can find this information by visiting this page https://www.bestchange.com/wiki/add.html and check Technical requirement no 11 which states "The monitoring's clickable button or logo must be placed on the website's main page in a visible place. In case there are multiple logos on your website, the BestChange's logo must be placed first." We are just fulfilling the conditions for application.Cool. I am aware of that condition. It's just that there are some exchangers that used their logo in the past, yet there weren't even any plans of a partnership.Quote from: Exchange It Online on July 03, 2022, 02:12:33 PMI hope this clarifies your confusion. We aim to be among the listed exchangers very soon after we officially apply to reputed monitor like BestChange.Â  it does clarify. Thanks for the response.
